title: A simple thing that would make the boards better
body:
I'm not sure if it's just me or not, but unless I'm logged in, I can't view "next riot post" in any threads.
If it's just me, FML. If it's not just me, please implement it again. I don't want to deal with the annoying captcha login just to see the posts that I'm actually interested in.

replies.body: When you are not logged in, you should click on "Switch to Chronological View" to see the "next riot post" functionality. Alternately, you can use the Rioter Comments widget on the left while in discussion view.
Hmmm, I guess I have no choice. Is there a particular reason you guys got rid of "first rioter comment etcâ€¦" when we aren't logged in?
